description:
August is Anal Pleasure Month and Sex With Emily is celebrating on today’s show with a panel of women who are ready to talk sex and get frank about the naughty nitty gritty of backdoor play. This group of ladies have a wide range of sexual experience to share and nothing is off limits in this steamy sex talk session.

Have you ever wanted to knock on your guys backdoor? How can you know if he would be open to the idea? Emily offers tips and tricks for introducing the idea of backdoor play to your man in a way that won’t send him running for the hills! This panel of ladies also each divulge their biggest turn-ons, universal turn offs, and their number one sex tips. What can you do to make sure you’re giving the best pleasure to your partner? Whether you’re into talking dirty, ear licking or hair pulling, this show has something everyone can relate to.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
